title: Hotkeys Configuration
description: Keyboard hotkeys configuration for ralph-ui using VS Code key binding format

key.description: VS Code-style key binding (e.g., 'cmd+shift+t', 'ctrl+c', 'Enter'). Modifiers: cmd, ctrl, alt, shift. Use '+' to combine.

description.description: Human-readable description of the hotkey action

category.description: Category for grouping hotkeys in the keyboard shortcuts dialog

commandPalette.description: Configuration for command palette appearance. If present, the hotkey will appear in the command palette.

label.description: Display label in the command palette

keywords.description: Additional search keywords for fuzzy matching
